content.question: Which of the following was an experience shared by the African leaders Nelson Mandela, Robert Mugabe, Jomo Kenyatta, and Kwame Nkrumah during the colonial period?

choices.label: They were held as political prisoners.
They served in a colonial army.
They originally came from French colonies.

content.answer: They were held as political prisoners.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
